name: Standard 2×2 crossover
preconditions: CV_intra=20%, half_life=8h, not NTI, no carryover risk, oral immediate-release
steps:
1. Input parameters into design selection system
2. System computes recommended design
notes: Recommend 2×2 crossover design (standard case)

name: Highly variable drug
preconditions: CV_intra=35%, half_life=6h, not NTI, no carryover risk
expected: Recommend full replicate design (e.g. 2×2×4) due to CV>30%
notes: Recommend full replicate design (e.g. 2×2×4) due to CV>30%

name: Narrow therapeutic index
expected: Recommend replicate design (2×2×4) for NTI scaling
notes: Recommend replicate design (2×2×4) for NTI scaling

name: Long half-life drug
preconditions: CV_intra=20%, half_life=72h, not NTI, no carryover risk
expected: Recommend parallel design (or 2×2 crossover with extended washout) due to long t½
notes: Recommend parallel design (or 2×2 crossover with extended washout) due to long t½ Parallel override only implemented for t1/2 >= 150h.

name: Carryover risk present
expected: Recommend parallel design to avoid carryover
notes: Recommend parallel design to avoid carryover Parallel override only implemented for t1/2 >= 150h.

name: Ethical steady-state constraint
preconditions: Patient study, no washout possible (steady state)
notes: Recommend parallel design (e.g. steady-state parallel trial):contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6} Scenario not modeled; engine falls back to baseline.

name: Modified-release formulation
expected: Increase design robustness (likely 2×2 crossover but monitor variability) due to complex kinetics
notes: Increase design robustness (likely 2×2 crossover but monitor variability) due to complex kinetics

name: High dropout risk
preconditions: CV_intra=20%, anticipated dropout high, standard conditions
expected: Consider parallel design to mitigate dropouts (avoids losing paired data)
notes: Consider parallel design to mitigate dropouts (avoids losing paired data)

name: Multiple formulations test
preconditions: Testing 3 formulations (T1, T2, R) under same condition
expected: Recommend parallel or nested design due to more than two treatments
notes: Recommend parallel or nested design due to more than two treatments Multiple formulations/arms not modeled; engine falls back to baseline.

name: Food effect study needed
expected: Recommend separate fed and fasting studies (2×2 each) or replicate if variability high
notes: Recommend separate fed and fasting studies (2×2 each) or replicate if variability high Food-effect driven design not modeled; engine falls back to baseline.

name: Edge: HVD with long t½
expected: Recommend replicate crossover with extended washout, or parallel if washout impractical:contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}:contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}
notes: Recommend replicate crossover with extended washout, or parallel if washout impractical:contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}:contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8} Parallel override only implemented for t1/2 >= 150h.

name: Edge: borderline variability
notes: Standard 2×2 crossover (CV below 30% threshold)

name: Edge: moderate HVD
notes: Replicate design (CV>30%)

name: Partial replicate case
expected: Full replicate recommended instead of partial due to bias in 3-period design:contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}
notes: Full replicate recommended instead of partial due to bias in 3-period design:contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}

name: Multiple period / sequence conflict
expected: Prefer simpler 2×2×4 design unless specific reason for more periods
notes: Prefer simpler 2×2×4 design unless specific reason for more periods

name: Synthetic: low variability CV=22
notes: Low variability should use 2x2 crossover.

name: Synthetic: high variability CV=40
notes: HVD should trigger replicate design.

name: Synthetic: very high variability CV=55 (RSABE)
notes: CV >= 50% should trigger RSABE 4-way replicate.

name: Synthetic: very long half-life t12=180h
notes: t1/2 >= 150h overrides CV and forces parallel design.

name: Synthetic: CV missing, CI present (default CV path)
notes: CV missing: engine currently falls back to baseline; no HVD/RSABE without confirmed CV.

name: Synthetic: borderline variability CV=28
notes: CV below 30% threshold.

name: Synthetic: carryover risk mentioned (not modeled)
notes: Carryover risk not explicitly modeled; engine may fallback to baseline.
